name: Écart des Achats
query:
select  
	mr_item.item_code as "Code Article:Link/Item:120",
	mr_item.parent as "Reçu d'achat::100",
	mr.supplier_name as "Fournisseur::100",
	
	mr_item.supplier_part_no as "Réf::100",
	mr_item.qty as "Qts Reçus::100",
	mr_item.original_qts as "Qts Facture Fournisseur::150",
	ifnull(mr_item.qty , 0) -  ifnull(mr_item.original_qts , 0) as "Qts Écart:Float:100",
	ifnull(mr_item.qts_ecart , 0) as "Qts Écart Enregistrée:Float:100",
	ifnull(mr_item.montant_ecart , 0) as "Montant:Float:100",
	mr.currency  as "Le Devise::100",
	ifnull(mr_item.valuation_rate , 0) as "Taux de valorisation:Currency:150",
	ifnull(mr_item.valuation_rate , 0)*ifnull(mr_item.qts_ecart , 0)  as "Total 		valorisation:Currency:150"

	
from
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item` mr_item , `tabPurchase Receipt` mr
where
	mr_item.parent = mr.name
	and mr_item.docstatus != 2 
	and ifnull(mr_item.original_qts , 0) != ifnull(mr_item.qty , 0)
